text: allaah ne tumhen mittee se paida kiya, phir veery se, phir tumhen jode-jode banaaya. usake gyaan ke bina na koee stree garbhavatee hotee hai aur na janm detee hai. aur jo koee aayu ko praapti karanevaala aayu ko praapt karata hai aur jo kuchh usakee aayu mein kamee hotee hai. anivaaryatah yah sab ek kitaab mein likha hota hai. nishchay hee yah sab allaah ke lie atyant saral hai
